title: Crimson Apocalypse {Capo} Recruiting (Casual/semi serious)
body:
Hey guys.
Crimson Apocalypse is looking for more LoL players that are interested in playing casual/semi serious un-ranked and (once we get more members) possibly ranked matches. Our usual playing times are 5-12PM (New Zealand time) so basically all evening. We have a fully dedicated teamspeak 3 server with 50 slots that can be used by you and anyone you would like to talk/play with once you have expressed interest in our group and have joined in a few games. We also have a 150+ member steam group that plays other games for anyone interested.

If you are interested in any of this please post below:
1. Your age (must be over 16)
2. Your games played (we would much prefer level 25+ is possible, but any level can be accepted)
3. Your preferred role/s

You must also be willing to work as a team

If you are interested simply post your reply below and I will send you our teamspeak details and any other details required.

(Also, if you are wondering about my level/games played please note that I will at most times not be participating in LoL games, so don't worry about my inexperience :))

Thanks for your time :)
